00134 
00135   // these methods can be used if you know what you are doing.
00136   // (IE: you have checked the types and done the allocations.)
00137   // they flush the File5 cache before doing the IO.
00138   // you should know the size of the elements.
00139   int read_array( size_t idx,size_t cnt,void* buf);
